H0.text: Adi Dassler founded the Adidas company, which company was founded by his brother Rudolf in 1948. Reebok

H1.text: Adi Dassler founded the Adidas company, which company was founded by his brother Rudolf in 1948. Nike

H2.text: Adi Dassler founded the Adidas company, which company was founded by his brother Rudolf in 1948. Converse

H3.text: Adi Dassler founded the Adidas company, which company was founded by his brother Rudolf in 1948. PUMA

A5.text: After a feud developed between them following World War II, the brothers went separate ways and started their respective companies in 1948.

A6.text: Adidas and Puma were founded by rival brothers.
